title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Kyler/Kliff TNF Blow Up, McCaffrey → Niners + Week 7 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Kyler/Kliff TNF Blow Up, McCaffrey → Niners + Week 7 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
description:
First, Colin reacts to the Cardinals TNF win over the Saints, defends the frequently maligned Kyler Murray, and gives his immediate thoughts on the late breaking trade sending Christian McCaffrey from the Panthers to the Niners (3:00). He also explains which move the Lakers should make right now before their season slips away.

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 7 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Steelers/Dolphins (16:00), Chiefs/Niners (18:00), Jets/Broncos (20:00), Seahawks/Chargers (23:00), Giants/Jags (29:00), Browns/Ravens (31:00), Packers/Commanders (34:00), and Texans/Raiders (34:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
